newsitem.title: USA: Laboratory Corp says its COO resigned.
newsitem.headline: Laboratory Corp says its COO resigned.

text.p: Laboratory Corp of America Holdings (LabCorp) said on Wednesday that David Howell resigned as chief operating officer.

Weavil's resignation follows a recent settlement by the company with the government and resolves all issues related to a federal investigation of the prior billing practices of LabCorp's predecessor companies, said LabCorp.
LabCorp said Ronald Sturgill, an executive vice president, would assume Howell's responsibilities until a successor was named.
LabCorp is a clinical laboratory organization with estimated annual revenues of $1.6 billion.
